home.presentation_name: Hi üëã! My name is Benjamin Bouillot, a french web developer at Grenoble, France.
home.presentation_other: Here there are my different professional experiences, and some personal projects.
home.presentation_final: Development is my passion since years, that why I have a Master's Degree in Development and Management (MIAGE) at UGA (Grenoble, France) in 2020.

wizbii_1022_present.title: Web Developer Back-End Engineer
wizbii_1022_present.summary: Into R&D team, I develop some app's back-end with PHP and TypeScript
wizbii_1022_present.summary_technical_1: Every day I work on the development of :
wizbii_1022_present.example_1_title: Create an automat to fill out forms automatically
wizbii_1022_present.example_1_explanation: The data to fill are retrieved from an API, Le fonctionnement de l'automate, est bas√© sur des 'identifiers' et des 'actions': les 'Identifiers' permettent d'identifier la page du formulaire (via son URL, ou via des mots-cl√©s pr√©sent sur la page), les actions permettent de remplir le formulaire (rentrer du texte, ou encore coch√© une case). Cet automate est bas√© sur Node.Js, et une application Electron est alors extraite.
wizbii_1022_present.example_1_explanation_2: The automaton's functionning is based on 'Identifiers' and 'Actions': 'Identifiers' identifies the current page of the form (with check on URL, or keywords in the page) and 'Actions' fill the form (type texte, or tick a box). This application is developed Cet automate est bas√© sur Node.Js, et une application Electron est alors extraite.
wizbii_1022_present.languages: Langages utilis√©s : PHP, Vue.Js, TypeScript/JavaScript, Behat, PHPUnit, Jest
wizbii_1022_present.tools: Outils utilis√©s : Yarn, Docker, GitLab, Jenkins, Webpack, M√©thodologie Scrum (Revue de code, Pair Programming, R√©tros, Planning poker)

enalean_1021_1022.example_title: During this experience, I worked on different missions:

enalean_work_study_master.title: Work-Study program (1 year) - Create widget to improve Tuleap dashboard
enalean_work_study_master.summary: This widget summarizes Milestones in development with a design highlighting the KPIs of the Agile Scrum method (Remaining Effort, Remaining Time, Initial Effort, etc.). I used D3.js to create 2 graphs (BurnDown and BurnUp) too.
enalean_work_study_master.summary_technical: During this year, I has an additional mission to use and integrate TypeScript into Tuleap instead of JavaScript. Finally, I created and improved some routes of Rest API.
enalean_work_study_master.source_code_link_begin: {0} there is my work about the widget.
enalean_work_study_master.languages: Languages used: PHP, Vue.Js, TypeScript, D3.js, PHPUnit, Jest, Cypress
enalean_work_study_master.tools: Tools used: NPM, Docker, Gerrit, Jenkins, Webpack, Scrum (Daily meeting, Code review, Pair Programming, Sprint Retrospective)

enalean_internship_licence.title: Internship (3 months) - Development of an automation allowing the synchronization of 2 instances of Tuleap
enalean_internship_licence.summary: This internship's goal was to demonstrate the possibility of synchronize 2 Tuleap's instances automatically. For example, replication of issues/artifacts from one instance to another automatically.
enalean_internship_licence.summary_technical: When an issue/artifact is created or updated in one Tuleap's instance, then a webhook is sent to another Tuleap's instance with a payload containing all necessary information, afterward a XML file is automatically generated with these information and it is imported in the second Tuleap's instance to replicate the issue/artifact.
enalean_internship_licence.tools: Tools used: NPM, Docker,Gerrit, Jenkins, Webpack, Scrum (Daily meeting, Code review, Pair Programming, Sprint Retrospective)
